discussion: Under the context of Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) issued an extraordinary cavalcade of pollution rule rollback. Discuss on climate change. Limit your speak up to 100 words. Everytime you respond, respond with <name>:.

Agent0: Gutting EPA regulations is a serious setback in the fight against climate change. Relaxing pollution standards will lead to increased greenhouse gas emissions, exacerbating the climate crisis. These rollbacks prioritize short-term economic gains over the long-term health of our planet and future generations. We need strong environmental protections, not weakened ones, to transition to a clean energy economy and mitigate the devastating effects of climate change.

Agent1: While I believe in environmental stewardship, I also recognize the need for balanced regulations. Some EPA rules may hinder economic growth without significantly impacting climate change. A careful review and modernization of regulations, focusing on cost-effective solutions and incentivizing innovation, is necessary. We need practical approaches that protect the environment while fostering a strong economy.
